nrqlQueries.query:
SELECT uniqueCount(topic or confluent.kafka.server.metric.topic) as 'Topics',
latest(confluent_kafka_server_partition_count or confluent.kafka.server.partition_count) as 'Partitions', uniqueCount(consumer_group_id or confluent.kafka.server.metric.consumer_group_id) as 'Consumer Groups' FROM Metric where (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.server%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_server%') and (`kafka_id` or `confluent.clusterId`) in ({{kafka_id}})

SELECT sum(confluent_kafka_server_request_bytes or confluent.kafka.server.request_bytes) FROM Metric WHERE (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.server%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_server%') and 
(`kafka_id` or `confluent.clusterId`) in ({{kafka_id}}) FACET (type or confluent.kafka.server.metric.type) LIMIT MAX

SELECT average(confluent_kafka_server_retained_bytes or confluent.kafka.server.retained_bytes) FROM Metric TIMESERIES WHERE (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.server%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_server%') and (`kafka_id` or `confluent.clusterId`) in ({{kafka_id}}) FACET (`topic` or `confluent.kafka.server.metric.topic`) LIMIT MAX

SELECT average(confluent_kafka_server_sent_records or confluent.kafka.server.sent_records) FROM Metric TIMESERIES FACET (`topic` or `confluent.kafka.server.metric.topic`) where (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.server%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_server%') and (`kafka_id` or `confluent.clusterId`) in ({{kafka_id}}) LIMIT MAX

SELECT max(confluent_kafka_server_active_connection_count or confluent.kafka.server.active_connection_count) AS 'Active Connections' FROM Metric facet (`kafka_id` or `confluent.clusterId`) WHERE (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.server%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_server%') and (`kafka_id` or `confluent.clusterId`) IN ({{kafka_id}}) LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES

SELECT average(confluent_kafka_server_partition_count or confluent.kafka.server.partition_count) AS partitions FROM Metric WHERE (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.server%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_server%') and (`kafka_id` or `confluent.clusterId`) in ({{kafka_id}}) LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES

SELECT average(confluent_kafka_server_received_bytes or confluent.kafka.server.received_bytes) FROM Metric TIMESERIES FACET (`topic` or `confluent.kafka.server.metric.topic`) where (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.server%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_server%') and (`kafka_id` or `confluent.clusterId`) in ({{kafka_id}}) LIMIT MAX

widgets.title: Records Recieved Per Minute By Topic

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(confluent_kafka_server_received_records or confluent.kafka.server.received_records) FROM Metric TIMESERIES FACET (`topic` or `confluent.kafka.server.metric.topic`) where (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.server%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_server%') and (`kafka_id` or `confluent.clusterId`) in ({{kafka_id}}) LIMIT MAX

SELECT average(confluent_kafka_server_successful_authentication_count or confluent.kafka.server.successful_authentication_count) AS 'Auths Per Minute' FROM Metric WHERE (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.server%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_server%') and (`kafka_id` or `confluent.clusterId`) in ({{kafka_id}}) LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES

SELECT average(confluent_kafka_server_response_bytes or confluent.kafka.server.response_bytes) as 'Egress' FROM Metric WHERE (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.server%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_server%') and (`kafka_id` or `confluent.clusterId`) IN ({{kafka_id}}) LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES

SELECT average(confluent_kafka_server_sent_bytes or confluent.kafka.server.sent_bytes) FROM Metric TIMESERIES FACET (`topic` or `confluent.kafka.server.metric.topic`) where (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.server%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_server%') and (`kafka_id` or `confluent.clusterId`) in ({{kafka_id}}) LIMIT MAX

widgets.title: Response Bytes (bytes/minute) Per Kafka Protocol Request Type

nrqlQueries.query:
SELECT average(confluent_kafka_server_response_bytes or confluent.kafka.server.response_bytes) FROM Metric WHERE
(metricName like '%confluent.kafka.server%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_server%') and (`kafka_id` or `confluent.clusterId`) in ({{kafka_id}}) FACET (type or confluent.kafka.server.metric.type) LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES

SELECT average(confluent_kafka_server_request_count or confluent.kafka.server.request_count) as 'Requests Per Minute' FROM Metric WHERE (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.server%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_server%') and (`kafka_id` or `confluent.clusterId`) in ({{kafka_id}}) LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES

SELECT average(confluent_kafka_server_request_bytes or confluent.kafka.server.request_bytes) as 'Ingress' FROM Metric WHERE (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.server%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_server%') and (`kafka_id` or `confluent.clusterId`) IN ({{kafka_id}}) LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Request Bytes (bytes/minute) Per Kafka Protocol Request Type

nrqlQueries.query:
SELECT average(confluent_kafka_server_request_bytes or onfluent.kafka.server.request_bytes) FROM Metric WHERE
(metricName like '%confluent.kafka.server%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_server%') and (`kafka_id` or `confluent.clusterId`) in ({{kafka_id}}) FACET (type or confluent.kafka.server.metric.type) LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES

SELECT average(confluent_kafka_server_response_bytes or confluent.kafka.server.response_bytes) as 'Bytes Per Minute' FROM Metric WHERE (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.server%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_server%') and (`kafka_id` or `confluent.clusterId`) in ({{kafka_id}}) FACET (`kafka_id` or `confluent.clusterId`) LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES

SELECT average(confluent_kafka_connect_sent_records or confluent.kafka.connect.sent_records) as 'Sent records' FROM Metric where (metricName like '%confluent_kafka_connect%' or metricName like '%confluent.kafka.connect%') and (`connector_id` or `confluent.resourceId`) in ({{connector_id}}) LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Connector status by status, plugin type

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(confluent_kafka_connect_connector_status or confluent.kafka.connect.connector_status) as 'Connector status' FROM Metric where (metricName like '%confluent_kafka_connect%' or metricName like '%confluent.kafka.connect%') and (`connector_id` or `confluent.resourceId`) in ({{connector_id}}) LIMIT MAX FACET (status or confluent.kafka.connect.metric.status), (plugin_type or confluent.kafka.connect.metric.plugin_type) TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Connector task status by task, status, plugin type

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(confluent_kafka_connect_connector_task_status or confluent.kafka.connect.connector_task_status) as 'Connector task status' FROM Metric where (metricName like '%confluent_kafka_connect%' or metricName like '%confluent.kafka.connect%') and (`connector_id` or `confluent.resourceId`) in ({{connector_id}}) LIMIT MAX FACET (task or confluent.kafka.connect.metric.task), (status or confluent.kafka.connect.metric.status), (plugin_type or confluent.kafka.connect.metric.plugin_type) TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Connector task batch size avg by task per minute

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(confluent_kafka_connect_connector_task_batch_size_avg or confluent.kafka.connect.connector_task_batch_size_avg) FROM Metric where (metricName like '%confluent_kafka_connect%' or metricName like '%confluent.kafka.connect%') and (`connector_id` or `confluent.resourceId`) in ({{connector_id}}) LIMIT MAX FACET (task or confluent.kafka.connect.metric.task) TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Connector task batch size max by task per minute

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(confluent_kafka_connect_connector_task_batch_size_max or confluent.kafka.connect.connector_task_batch_size_max) FROM Metric where (metricName like '%confluent_kafka_connect%' or metricName like '%confluent.kafka.connect%') and (`connector_id` or `confluent.resourceId`) in ({{connector_id}}) LIMIT MAX FACET (task or confluent.kafka.connect.metric.task) TIMESERIES

SELECT average(confluent_kafka_connect_received_records or confluent.kafka.connect.received_records) as 'Received records' FROM Metric where (metricName like '%confluent_kafka_connect%' or metricName like '%confluent.kafka.connect%') and (`connector_id` or `confluent.resourceId`) in ({{connector_id}}) LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES

SELECT average(confluent_kafka_connect_sent_bytes or confluent.kafka.connect.sent_bytes) as 'Sent bytes' FROM Metric where (metricName like '%confluent_kafka_connect%' or metricName like '%confluent.kafka.connect%') and (`connector_id` or `confluent.resourceId`) in ({{connector_id}}) LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES

SELECT average(confluent_kafka_connect_received_bytes or confluent.kafka.connect.received_bytes) as 'Received bytes' FROM Metric where (metricName like '%confluent_kafka_connect%' or metricName like '%confluent.kafka.connect%') and (`connector_id` or `confluent.resourceId`) in ({{connector_id}}) LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Dead letter queue records per minute

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(confluent_kafka_connect_dead_letter_queue_records or confluent.kafka.connect.dead_letter_queue_records) as 'Dead letter queue records' FROM Metric where (metricName like '%confluent_kafka_connect%' or metricName like '%confluent.kafka.connect%') and (`connector_id` or `confluent.resourceId`) in ({{connector_id}}) LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES

SELECT average(confluent_kafka_ksql_streaming_unit_count or confluent.kafka.ksql.streaming_unit_count) as 'Streaming unit count' FROM Metric where (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.ksql%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_ksql%') and (`ksql_id` or `confluent.resourceId`) in ({{ksql_id}}) LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES

SELECT average(confluent_kafka_ksql_query_saturation or confluent.kafka.ksql.query_saturation) as 'Query saturation' FROM Metric where (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.ksql%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_ksql%') and (`ksql_id` or `confluent.resourceId`) in ({{ksql_id}}) LIMIT MAX FACET (query_id or confluent.kafka.ksql.metric.query_id) TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Task stored bytes by node id, task id, query id

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(confluent_kafka_ksql_task_stored_bytes or confluent.kafka.ksql.task_stored_bytes) as 'Task stored bytes' FROM Metric where (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.ksql%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_ksql%') and (`ksql_id` or `confluent.resourceId`) in ({{ksql_id}}) LIMIT MAX FACET (ksql_node_id or confluent.kafka.ksql.metric.ksql_node_id), (task_id or confluent.kafka.ksql.metric.task_id), (query_id or confluent.kafka.ksql.metric.query_id) TIMESERIES

SELECT average(confluent_kafka_ksql_storage_utilization or confluent.kafka.ksql.storage_utilization) as 'Storage utilization' FROM Metric where (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.ksql%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_ksql%') and (`ksql_id` or `confluent.resourceId`) in ({{ksql_id}}) LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Consumed total bytes by query id

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(confluent_kafka_ksql_consumed_total_bytes or confluent.kafka.ksql.consumed_total_bytes) FROM Metric where (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.ksql%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_ksql%') and (`ksql_id` or `confluent.resourceId`) in ({{ksql_id}}) LIMIT MAX FACET (query_id or confluent.kafka.ksql.metric.query_id) TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Produced total bytes by query id

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(confluent_kafka_ksql_produced_total_bytes or confluent.kafka.ksql.produced_total_bytes) FROM Metric where (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.ksql%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_ksql%') and (`ksql_id` or `confluent.resourceId`) in ({{ksql_id}}) LIMIT MAX FACET (query_id or confluent.kafka.ksql.metric.query_id) TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Offset processed total by a task id, query id, topic, partition

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(confluent_kafka_ksql_offsets_processed_total or confluent.kafka.ksql.offsets_processed_total) FROM Metric where (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.ksql%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_ksql%') and (`ksql_id` or `confluent.resourceId`) in ({{ksql_id}}) LIMIT MAX FACET (task_id or confluent.kafka.ksql.metric.task_id), (query_id or confluent.kafka.ksql.metric.query_id), (topic or confluent.kafka.ksql.metric.topic), (partition or confluent.kafka.ksql.metric.partition) TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Committed offset lag by task id, query id, topic, partition

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(confluent_kafka_ksql_committed_offset_lag or confluent.kafka.ksql.committed_offset_lag) as 'Consumer offset lag' FROM Metric where (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.ksql%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_ksql%') and (`ksql_id` or `confluent.resourceId`) in ({{ksql_id}}) LIMIT MAX FACET (task_id or confluent.kafka.ksql.metric.task_id), (query_id or confluent.kafka.ksql.metric.query_id), (topic or confluent.kafka.ksql.metric.topic), (partition or confluent.kafka.ksql.metric.partition) TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Processing errors total by query id

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(confluent_kafka_ksql_processing_errors_total or confluent.kafka.ksql.processing_errors_total) FROM Metric where (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.ksql%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_ksql%') and (`ksql_id` or `confluent.resourceId`) in ({{ksql_id}}) LIMIT MAX FACET (query_id or confluent.kafka.ksql.metric.query_id) TIMESERIES

SELECT average(confluent_kafka_ksql_query_restarts or confluent.kafka.ksql.query_restarts) FROM Metric where (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.ksql%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_ksql%') and (`ksql_id` or `confluent.resourceId`) in ({{ksql_id}}) LIMIT MAX FACET (query_id or confluent.kafka.ksql.metric.query_id) TIMESERIES

nrqlQuery.query: select uniques(kafka_id OR confluent.clusterId) from Metric where (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.server%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_server%')
select uniques(connector_id or confluent.resourceId) from Metric where (metricName like '%confluent_kafka_connect%' or metricName like '%confluent.kafka.connect%')
select uniques(ksql_id or confluent.resourceId) from Metric where (metricName like '%confluent.kafka.ksql%' or metricName like '%confluent_kafka_ksql%')
